title: Banana Bread
ingredients: 4 bananas, 1/2 cup butter, 1/2 cup sugar, 2 eggs, 2 cups flour, 1/2 tsp baking soda, 1 tsp baking powder, pinch salt, 1/4 cup nuts (we like pecans),

title: Chicken Chimis
ingredients: 8 oz cream cheese, 8 oz pepperjack cheese, 1 1/2 tablespoons taco seasoning, 1 lb shredded chicken, 8 large tortillas, cooking spray, toppings as desired,

title: Smoked Baked Beans
ingredients: \#10 can of baked beans, 1 large onion, 1 green pepper, 2 large jalapenos, 1/2 pound bacon ends, 1-2 cups brown sugar, 1 tablespoon mustard powder, bbq rub lighly sprinkled across top, kosher salt, freshly cracked pepper,
